description: Check the functionality of the login page

parameters.name: arg2
parameters.value:
1. Go to:
https://www.saucedemo.com
2. Input error username and password
3. Press Login
4. Click on "Add to cart" button on any item
5. Try to click on "Remove" button

parameters.name: arg4
parameters.value:
User should be able to login and access inventory screen.
After pressing the button to add the item to the cart, user shouldn't be able to delete the item from the cart again
